open.description: If true, the component is shown.
open.description_zh: 如果为 true，则显示组件。

action.description: A ref for imperative actions. It currently only supports updatePosition() action.
action.description_zh: 命令式操作的引用。它目前仅支持 updatePosition（） 操作。

anchorEl.description: An HTML element, PopoverVirtualElement, or a function that returns either. It's used to set the position of the popover.
anchorEl.description_zh: HTML 元素、PopoverVirtualElement 或返回任一元素的函数。它用于设置弹出框的位置。

anchorOrigin.description: This is the point on the anchor where the popover's anchorEl will attach to. This is not used when the anchorReference is 'anchorPosition'.Options: vertical: [top, center, bottom]; horizontal: [left, center, right].
anchorOrigin.description_zh: 这是 popover 的 anchorEl 将连接到的锚点上的点。当 anchorReference 为 'anchorPosition' 时，不使用此功能。选项：垂直：[顶部、中心、底部];水平：[左、中、右]。
anchorOrigin.type: { horizontal: center| left| right| number, vertical: bottom| center| top| number }

anchorPosition.description: This is the position that may be used to set the position of the popover. The coordinates are relative to the application's client area.
anchorPosition.description_zh: 这是可用于设置弹出框位置的位置。坐标相对于应用程序的工作区域。

anchorReference.description: This determines which anchor prop to refer to when setting the position of the popover.
anchorReference.description_zh: 这决定了在设置弹出框的位置时要引用的锚点道具。

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

container.description: An HTML element, component instance, or function that returns either. The container will passed to the Modal component.By default, it uses the body of the anchorEl's top-level document object, so it's simply document.body most of the time.
container.description_zh: 返回任一元素、组件实例或函数的 HTML 元素、组件实例或函数。容器将传递给 Modal 组件。默认情况下，它使用 anchorEl 的顶级文档对象的正文，因此大多数时候它只是 document.body。

marginThreshold.description: Specifies how close to the edge of the window the popover can appear. If null, the popover will not be constrained by the window.
marginThreshold.description_zh: 指定弹出窗口可以显示在窗口边缘的距离。如果为 null，则弹出框将不受窗口的约束。

onClose.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be closed. The reason parameter can optionally be used to control the response to onClose.
onClose.description_zh: 当组件请求关闭时触发回调。可以选择使用 reason 参数来控制对 onClose 的响应。

PaperProps.description: Props applied to the Paper element.This prop is an alias for slotProps.paper and will be overriden by it if both are used.Deprecated - Use slotProps.paper instead.
PaperProps.description_zh: 应用于 Paper 元素的道具。此 prop 是 slotProps.paper 的别名，如果两者都使用，它将被它覆盖。已弃用 - 请改用 slotProps.paper。

slotProps.description: The extra props for the slot components. You can override the existing props or add new ones.
slotProps.description_zh: 插槽组件的额外道具。您可以覆盖现有道具或添加新道具。
slotProps.type: { paper?: func| object, root?: func| object }

slots.description: The components used for each slot inside.
slots.description_zh: 内部每个插槽使用的组件。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。

transformOrigin.description: This is the point on the popover which will attach to the anchor's origin.Options: vertical: [top, center, bottom, x(px)]; horizontal: [left, center, right, x(px)].
transformOrigin.description_zh: 这是弹出窗口上的点，它将连接到锚点的原点。选项：垂直：[top， center， bottom， x（px）];水平：[左、中、右、x（px）]。
transformOrigin.type: { horizontal: center| left| right| number, vertical: bottom| center| top| number }

TransitionComponent.description: The component used for the transition. Follow this guide to learn more about the requirements for this component.
TransitionComponent.description_zh: 用于过渡的组件。按照本指南了解有关此组件要求的详细信息。

transitionDuration.description: Set to 'auto' to automatically calculate transition time based on height.
transitionDuration.description_zh: 设置为“自动”可根据高度自动计算过渡时间。
transitionDuration.type: auto| number| { appear?: number, enter?: number, exit?: number }

TransitionProps.description: Props applied to the transition element. By default, the element is based on this Transition component.
TransitionProps.description_zh: 应用于过渡元素的道具。默认情况下，该元素基于此 Transition 组件。

events.name: onClose
events.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be closed. The  parameter can optionally be used to control the response to onClose.
events.description_zh: 当组件请求关闭时触发回调。该参数可以选择用于控制对 onClose 的响应。
